Hatred.

As I said, a most powerfull feeling. You hate me, I hate you back,=
 we
get to tear at each other until one is left. Maybe longer too. You
took=
 your turn, and, pretty much, you screwed up. Be ready now. I'm
coming to g=
et you. I have a lot of pals just waiting to pay you back.
It will be slow =
in the coming, but the longer vengeance cooks, the
sweeter the taste. You t=
ried and botched. I won't.

***********************************************=
**

A normal 18-wheeler would have shook the bridge coming up to the
air-fe=
rry going to Relay. Ultra Magnum was no ordinary 18-wheeler. He
sported so =
many weapons and ammo that he literally took the ferry to
its limits. Wordl=
essly, he took place by himself in the next one
available. The workers ther=
e started to complain, but his silence
simply freaked them out. Good enough=
. As soon as he got up there, he'd
start his plan.
